fields.value: Electro Dynamic and Plasmonic Features of Nano-Plasmonic Bow Tie Antenna

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Nano-plasmonic bow tie antennas are similar to other antennas except that, it is the size of nano and is specifically designed for very wide bandwidth, theoretically infinite. The electromagnetic system of nano-plasmonic bow tie antenna produces the incident energy that have numerical aperture matched to the far-field beam pattern of the antenna.
	This paper discloses electrodynamic and plasmonic features of nano scale bow tie antenna. These nano structures have a vast array of applications due to their ability to focus incident light into a narrow region of extremely high. It also focuseson E-field enhancement intensity between various planes such as Gaussian and continuous source for specific parameters and geometry of the nano-plasmonic bow tie antenna.

keywordValue.value: Nano-Bow Tie Antenna; Antenna; Wide band Antenna

publicationCitation.value: Manu Mitra (2018) Electro Dynamic and Plasmonic Features of Nano-Plasmonic Bow Tie Antenna. SF J Telecommunic 2:3.

publicationIDNumber.value: Electro Dynamic and Plasmonic Features of Nano-Plasmonic Bow Tie Antenna
